source.name: PIECE: Plant Intron Exon Comparison and Evolution Database
source.description: PIECE is a plant gene structure comparison and evolution database with 25 species. Annotated genes extracted from the species are classified based on the Pfam motif and phylogenetic trees are reconstructed for each gene category integrating exon-intron and protein motif information.
